cast.overview: For Jimmy Smith, Jr., life is a daily fight just to keep hope alive. Feeding his dreams in Detroit's vibrant music scene, Jimmy wages an extraordinary personal struggle to find his own voice - and earn a place in a world where rhymes rule, legends are born and every moment… is another chance.
cast.title: 8 Mile

also_known_as: ブランドン・T・ジャクソン
details.biography: Brandon Timothy Jackson (born March 7, 1984) is an American actor and stand-up comedian. He is best known for his supporting roles in the Hollywood films Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief, Percy Jackson: Sea of Monsters, Tropic Thunder, Lottery Ticket, Roll Bounce, Tooth Fairy, and a leading role in Big Mommas: Like Father, Like Son. He's also known for his TV roles as Ben Robinson on Mr. Robinson and Roofie Jackson on Deadbeat.
details.name: Brandon T. Jackson
